originalText.text: I had a tricky gate lock repair job and the locksmith did an outstanding job. Both the gate lock and deadbolt are now perfectly aligned. I am completely satisfied with the service.

text.text: I had a tricky gate lock repair job and the locksmith did an outstanding job. Both the gate lock and deadbolt are now perfectly aligned. I am completely satisfied with the service.

originalText.text: I needed to get my car door open. I called Sugar Hill Locksmiths and they were absolute pros! I was so pleased with their work and how quickly they came to my rescue.

text.text: I needed to get my car door open. I called Sugar Hill Locksmiths and they were absolute pros! I was so pleased with their work and how quickly they came to my rescue.

originalText.text: When you talk to these guys request Ted, he's the man. Their mobile service saved me a trip & tow to the dealership to have new 2014 Toyota Tundra Key FOB programmed.

text.text: When you talk to these guys request Ted, he's the man. Their mobile service saved me a trip & tow to the dealership to have new 2014 Toyota Tundra Key FOB programmed.

originalText.text:
These reviews are fake. Look at the the "user's" previous posts (all around the same time, for similar companies, and the writing is like a robot's.) And look at their stock-photo profile pics.

This company is a scam.

I was locked out of my apartment for three hours because the person answering the phone gave the locksmith the wrong number to call. Wouldn't you assume the number I'm calling from (repeatedly, over three hours) is the one the locksmith should call??? If it weren't for my kind neighbor, I'd have been standing out alone in my hallway for three hours.

When the locksmith finally came (half an hour later than he said he would, when I finally got in contact with him,) he said it would be $275. At no point did anyone quote a price to me. I asked him if that was the company price or if he was an individual contractor and he said it was the company's, but he couldn't even name the company. It came to $299 after tax. It was 10:30 at this point, I'd gotten locked out around 6:30. I had little choice but to pay him.

When I got inside, I tried to call the locksmith phone person back, asking about pricing. They said they'd have their manager call me back in about ten minutes, but of course that never happened.

You guys took full advantage of me when I was in an intensely vulnerable situation. If it weren't for my kind neighbors, it could've gone much worse. You're a stain on the community.

originalText.text: They were able to have someone come out to rekey our home the same day. Locksmith was on time, courteous and did a great and professional job. Would definitely recommend to all fellow homeowners!

text.text: They were able to have someone come out to rekey our home the same day. Locksmith was on time, courteous and did a great and professional job. Would definitely recommend to all fellow homeowners!
